channel.title: Gayle Laakman McDowell on Adrián Moreno Peña · Web & Mobile Developer, all-around coder
channel.description: Recent content in Gayle Laakman McDowell on Adrián Moreno Peña · Web & Mobile Developer, all-around coder

item.title: Cracking the Coding Interview
item.description: Really good guide to prepare for and succeed in technical interviews. It is really useful to gain confidence on technical interviews. The book includes a collection of practice problems and solutions, and is based on McDowell’s experience as a hiring manager and technical interviewer.
